meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Amanda Lanyon-Lesage Jake Ayres Paul Nelson Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6485.

td.p: Amanda Lanyon-Lesage, a blogger from Madison, Wisconsin
Jake Ayres, a law student from San Diego, California
Paul Nelson, a Senate staff aide originally from Iowa City, Iowa (whose 5-day cash winnings total $54,900)

tr.td: NFL
MAGAZINES
RAISE THE BRITANNIC!
COLOR ME GOOD
FRENCH EPONYMS
USING YOUR JEOP-PS
